game.name: MILFS 2025
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Sports
game.shortDescription: MILFS 2025 - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MILFS 2025 - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

reviewHighlights.text: I've always wanted to know what the word MILF means. I came across this game and now it's my favorite word.
A very cool game. Beautiful characters and graphics. Many different levels and achievements. The game is addictive, I recommend it
